languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Данная единица имеет долгий срок службы и наблюдала планетарные катастрофы . Их статистическая значимость невелика в масштабах сектора. Утверждение загрязнено эмоциональным грузом скорби".

"This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Данная единица имеет долгий срок службы и наблюдала планетарные катастрофы . Их статистическая значимость невелика в масштабах сектора. Утверждение загрязнено эмоциональным грузом скорби".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。指定单位已经经历了相当长的使用寿命，发生过许多场行星级灾难。在星系规模上，小莱卡德的统计意义微不足道。因此，你的说法是受到了悲伤情绪的蒙蔽。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。指定单位已经经历了相当长的使用寿命，发生过许多场行星级灾难。在星系规模上，小莱卡德的统计意义微不足道。因此，你的说法是受到了悲伤情绪的蒙蔽。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. L'unité mentionnée est en service depuis des décennies et a déjà été témoin de nombreuses catastrophes planétaires. À l'échelle d'un secteur, leur implication en termes de statistiques est négligeable. La déclaration est donc fortement influencée par un fardeau émotionnel important lié au deuil. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. L'unité mentionnée est en service depuis des décennies et a déjà été témoin de nombreuses catastrophes planétaires. À l'échelle d'un secteur, leur implication en termes de statistiques est négligeable. La déclaration est donc fortement influencée par un fardeau émotionnel important lié au deuil. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa declaración es falsa. La unidad a la que se refiere ha experimentado una larga vida útil y observado numerosas catástrofes planetarias. Su impacto estadístico es negligible a escala del sector. La declaración estaba contaminada por la carga emocional del pesar».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: «Esa declaración es falsa. La unidad a la que se refiere ha experimentado una larga vida útil y observado numerosas catástrofes planetarias. Su impacto estadístico es negligible a escala del sector. La declaración estaba contaminada por la carga emocional del pesar».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その発言は偽りだ。規定のユニットは長らく従事する間に、多くの星々の災害を観測している。それらの統計的重要性は星系規模で考えれば無視できる程度である。その発言は悲しみという感情的負荷で汚染されている」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は偽りだ。規定のユニットは長らく従事する間に、多くの星々の災害を観測している。それらの統計的重要性は星系規模で考えれば無視できる程度である。その発言は悲しみという感情的負荷で汚染されている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die angegebene Einheit hat ein Leben lang gedient und viele planetare Katastrophen erlebt. Ihre statistische Signifikanz ist auf sektoraler Skala zu vernachlässigen. Die Aussage ist belastet durch die Emotion der Trauer."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die angegebene Einheit hat ein Leben lang gedient und viele planetare Katastrophen erlebt. Ihre statistische Signifikanz ist auf sektoraler Skala zu vernachlässigen. Die Aussage ist belastet durch die Emotion der Trauer."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Bu birim uzun yıllardır hizmetini sürdürmekte olup birçok gezegensel felaketi gözlemlemiştir. Bu felaketlerin istatistiki karşılığı, sektörel ölçekte önemsiz sayılmaktadır. İlgili önerme, keder denilen duygusal yük nedeniyle kusurludur."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The specified unit has experienced a long service life and observed many planetary catastrophes. Their statistical significance is negligible on a sectoral scale. The statement is tainted by the emotional burden of grief."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Bu birim uzun yıllardır hizmetini sürdürmekte olup birçok gezegensel felaketi gözlemlemiştir. Bu felaketlerin istatistiki karşılığı, sektörel ölçekte önemsiz sayılmaktadır. İlgili önerme, keder denilen duygusal yük nedeniyle kusurludur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
